explains: adj. 智利文化的；智利人的；智利的

sentences.en: We are doing a special promotion of Chilean wines.
sentences.cn: 我们正在进行智利葡萄酒特别促销活动。

sentences.en: Chilean officials like to compare their country with Finland or New Zealand.
sentences.cn: 智利官员喜欢将其国家与芬兰或新西兰进行比较。

sentences.en: China's newly renovated Great Wall Station on King George Island makes the Russian and Chilean bases here seem outdated.
sentences.cn: 中国新翻修的乔治王岛上的长城站，让这里的俄罗斯和智利基地显得很过时。
